application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 3 (remediation works) of permission 23/03474/FUL (Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to vary Condition 1 (Approved Drawings), Condition 11 (Cycle Parking) and Condition 12(Refuse Management) of planning permission 20/02235/FUL (Erection of 9-storey building comprising 41 self-contained residential units (12 x one-bedroom, 15 x two-bedroom and 14 x three-bedroom) (following demolition of existing garage units to rear of 1-44 Cumberland House;) with associated car parking, refuse and cycle storage and landscaping improvements to existing communal amenity space serving Cumberland House for use of existing and proposed residents.)
